title: [Nishaye Accoutrements]
description: Continuing from the western room, the kakore plank floor glows warmly beneath the sunlight that spills from a broad window of artfully distorted glass.  Marble tiles overtake the golden wood as it transitions northward, their soft creamy hue mirroring the textured walls and ceiling.  A framed spray of preserved fireleaf leaves is flanked by two bronze sconces above a glossed red maple trestle table.
